1.0.0.name: wordpress/portfolion
1.0.0.description: The Portfolion plugin creates a portfolio post type with a featured image to show off your work. Portfolion adds portfolio categories and tags specific to the portfolio post type. It adds custom post meta for a link to the portfolio project with several helpful functions for retrieval of the project link in your templates, similar to other WordPress template tags. Portfolion also comes bundled with starter templates to integrate into your theme.
